title: Probably a very simple question, but you never know...
content:
I'm using fontographer on a pc and am trying to save a mac-truetype version of a font that I've made... my friend, who runs osx, says that he can't get it to work. The file extension is .Suit$. You can download it here: [http://www.craigbutterworth.com/type/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203346/http:/www.craigbutterworth.com/type/index.html)   
Anyway, I'd appreciate any help that you can give.   
\_Craig
author: butterworth

comments.content: I'll see if I can convert it for you.
